title: How to Make Slow Cooker Chicken Cordon Bleu

steps.headline: Lay the chicken breasts onto a clean surface.
steps.description: Top with the cooked ham slices then the cheese slices.

steps.headline: Roll up chicken breasts and secure with toothpicks.
Spray a slow cooker pot with nonstick cooking spray.
Lay the chicken breasts into the pot forming a triangle.
steps.description: Layer the rest of the chicken breasts on top.

steps.headline: Whisk together the soup and milk in a small bowl.
Cover the slow cooker and cook 4 hours or until the chicken breasts are no longer pink inside.
Serve over cooked and drained egg noodles.

text: Lay the chicken breasts onto a clean surface. Top with the cooked ham slices then the cheese slices. Roll up chicken breasts and secure with toothpicks.  Spray a slow cooker pot with nonstick cooking spray.  Lay the chicken breasts into the pot forming a triangle. Layer the rest of the chicken breasts on top. Whisk together the soup and milk in a small bowl. Pour over the chicken. Cover the slow cooker and cook 4 hours or until the chicken breasts are no longer pink inside.  Serve over cooked and drained egg noodles.
